title: Bank API with ML for Fraud Detection
description: Machine learning powered banking system which identified fraudulent transactions.
longDescription: Building a banking API with FastAPI with a machine learning transaction analysis and fraud detectino system.
features: Core Banking Functionality: Account creation, transfers, deposits, withdrawals, statements
Virtal Card Management: Card creation, activation, blocking, and top-ups
User Management: Profiles, Next of Kin informatin, KYC implementation
AI/ML-Powered Fraud Detection: ML-based transactin analysis and fraud detection
Background Processing: Email notifications, PDF generation, and ML training
Advanced Deployment: Container orchestratino, reverse proxying, and high availability
ML Ops: Model training, evaluation, deployment, and monitoring
challenges: Learning how to build a full production level fintech solution.

title: Real Estate Dashboard
description: Built a comprehensive analytics dashboard to identify trends in the UK Real Estate Market.
longDescription: End-to-End Data Engineering project to develop a dashboard which showcases various metrics around the price paid data for various land and property transactions in England and Wales.
challenges: Handling large datasets efficiently, creating responsive visualizations, and ensuring data accuracy across multiple sources.
